original_text: After Lo-Ruhamah stopped drinking Gomer's milk, Gomer became pregnant again. She gave birth to another son.
korean_text: 고멜이 로루하마를 젖뗀 후에 또 임신하여 아들을 낳으매

sentences.original_text: After Lo-Ruhamah stopped drinking Gomer's milk
sentences.korean_translation: 로루하마가 고멜의 젖을 마시기를 멈춘 후에

sentences.original_text: She gave birth to another son
